## GroupedTableMetadata interface

Grouped table metadata, contains columns and metadata for column groups

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GroupedTableMetadata<TColumn extends GridColumn> extends BasicTableMetadata<TColumn> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [groups](./grid.groupedtablemetadata.groups.md) | <code>HeaderTableGroup[]</code> | Definition of header groups that are displayed in header |
